"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55932f9263687237620017f2#post_55932f9263687237620017f2
Most countries have severe laws against people taking the law into their own hands.  You would still be the most wanted criminal in your country for illegal use of military equipment, firing military equipment in civilian centers, endangering lives of numerous civilians and dozens of other crimes.

Tl:dr; if ironman was real his financial assets would be frozen and he would be serving 70 to 90 years in prison.

Dirty deeds done dirt cheap is one of the most broken stands.

[spoiler]It basically allows different parallel worlds to exist at the same time, And its user can travel between them by getting closed between two objects.[/spoiler]

"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559333916368723399001434#post_559333916368723399001434
The funny thing about Jojo is its probably one of the few shows hearing spoilers from doesn't really matter.

Because you cant really, imagine, whats happening in your head.

Its like when I first heard about the stand that [spoiler]TURNS PEOPLE INTO DINOSAURS[/spoiler] my legit reaction was "Well, alright! gotta see that shit". It just makes me want to see MORE!
